Epigrams and sentences spirituall in vers, of Gregori Nazanzen, an auncient & famous bishop in the Greke churche Englished by Tho. Drant. Gregory, of Nazianzus, Saint. Drant, Thomas, d. 1578?
[93] p.
Imprinted at London in Fletestreate, neare vnto S. Dunstones church by Thomas Marshe, [London] : 1568.
In verse. Signatures: A⁸ B⁴ C-F⁸ G⁴ (last leaf blank). Title in ornamental border. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
